CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgriFlow Solutions relative to TerraTrade Network?
SRP.A: AgriFlow Solutions is {below} TerraTrade Network in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AgroChain Management relative to FarmGate Transit?
SRP.A: AgroChain Management is {below} FarmGate Transit in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing HarvestLink Systems relative to CropConnect Logistics?
SRP.A: HarvestLink Systems is {above} CropConnect Logistics in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {CropConnect Logistics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {HarvestLink Systems}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AgriFlow Solutions's maximum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AgriFlow Solutions's maximum Food Waste is in {1998}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is HarvestLink Systems's minimum Food Waste in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: HarvestLink Systems's minimum Food Waste is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1998, did the total Food Waste experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1998?
NC.A: The change in total food waste between 1993 and 1998 was {larger} than between 1988 and 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1998, did the total Food Waste experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total food waste between 1996 and 1998 was {larger} than between 1991 and 1992.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1991 higher or lower than in 1998?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1991 was {lower} than in 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1996, did the total Food Waste experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total food waste between 1990 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1988 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {CropConnect Logistics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AgroChain Management and CropConnect Logistics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AgroChain Management and CropConnect Logistics did not exchange leading positions.
